content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
The food was amazing and the service was good. The ambiance was amazing in terms of visuals, and wasn't that busy. All was good until we got were going through the noodles in one of their "popular" dishes and found a hair. I'd be less disgusted if it was just a strand of hair, but no that hair had debris and knotting. Idk if its cuz we went late, or the person cooking up food there needs better shampoo. Never seen anything like it before, enforce a hairnet or hat policy for that place.
